/config.description: Choose a Share for cardigann configuration. Eg: create a Share called cardigann-config for this purpose alone.
/config.label: Config Storage

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run cardigann as. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID to run cardigann as.

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID to run cardigann as.

Cardigann.description: cardigann works as a proxy server: it translates queries from apps (Sonarr, SickRage, CouchPotato, Mylar, etc). (modified for vpn)
